job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Law Enforcement,Information Technology and Services,Computer Software
job.description: pstrongHOW TO APPLYstrongppbrppTo apply for this position please click the Easy Apply button Applications submitted without a resume will not be acceptedppstrongnbspstrongppstrongnbspstrongppstrongJOB DESCRIPTIONstrongppstrongnbspstrongppThe FBIs Applications and Data Division is looking for dedicated technologists to help us face some of the nations toughest challenges As an FBI Software Engineer you will design and develop data platforms and solutions collect and analyze system requirements evaluate viable options test and conduct quality assurance configuration and change management and provide ongoing maintenance and support Your ability to work on multiple parallel projects and tasks and operate in a dynamic fastpaced teamoriented environment is essential If helping the FBI stay ahead of threats by delivering on the potential of software and data sounds like the right fit for you join our missionppnbspppnbspppstrongnbspstrongppstrongSALARY LEVELstrongppstrongnbspstrongpullistrongnbspstrongSalary is commensurate to experience and locationliulpstrongnbspstrongppstrongnbspstrongppstrongKEY REQUIREMENTSstrongppbrpulliMust be a US citizenliliMust be able to obtain a Top Secret ClearanceliliMeet the FBIs Employment Eligibility requirementsliliMust be in compliance with the FBI Employment Drug PolicyliliMust never have been convicted of a felonyliulpstrongnbspstrongppstrongnbspstrongppstrongEDUCATION AND EXPERIENTIAL universityliulpstrongnbspstrongppstrongAll degrees must be verified by submitting college transcriptsstrongppstrongnbspstrongppstrongSpecialized ExperiencestrongpulliExperience with software engineering fundamentals data structures algorithms design patternsliliStrong programming and analytical skillsliliDemonstrated problemsolving and debugging skills necessary to determine the root methodologies including Agile Scrum and KanbanliliThe ability to comprehend and analyze complex technical problems and quickly identify and implement solutions to address those problemsliliExperience
